name: B. Cover Points
statement:
There are n points on the plane, (x_1,y_1), (x_2,y_2),
ldots, (x_n,y_n).You need to place an isosceles triangle with two sides
on the coordinate axis to cover all points (a point is covered if it
lies inside the triangle or on the side of the triangle). Calculate the
minimum length of the shorter side of the triangle.
